requirements.description: Your Application can only collect and process user data if you provide and adhere to a published privacy policy
Your privacy policy must be easily accessible and conspicuously linked from the Application
Your privacy policy must incorporate by reference and link to the Snap Privacy Policy

type.summary: Reference and Link to Snap Privacy Policy

requirements.description: Your privacy policy must clearly and accurately describe to users what user information is accessed, collected, and stored by you and your Application

type.summary: Transparency on Data Access, Collection, and Storage

requirements.description: Your privacy policy must explain how and why the user information is used, processed, and shared with Snap and other third parties

type.summary: Clarity on Data Usage, Processing, and Sharing

requirements.description: You can only provide Snap with personal data if otherwise agreed to in writing by you and Snap

type.summary: Written Agreement for Personal Data Provision
